name: Inventory Demand Quantity
description: This measure behaves differently based on the material type. For materials labeled as 'ROH' or 'HALB,' it calculates the cumulative sum of the process order reservations. If the material type is 'FERT' or 'HAWA,' the measure calculates the open quantities in sales orders considering allocations. For all other material types, the value of the measure is blank.
expression: {"FERT"} IN ALLSELECTED('Material Master'[Material Type]), [Sales Order Open Quantity],
{"HAWA"} IN ALLSELECTED('Material Master'[Material Type]), [Sales Order Open Quantity]

{"ROH"} IN ALLSELECTED('Material Master'[Material Type]), CALCULATE(ABS(SUM('Process Order Reservation'[Requirement Quantity])),FILTER('Process Order Reservation', 'Process Order Reservation'[Requirement Date]< TODAY())),

{"HALB"} IN ALLSELECTED('Material Master'[Material Type]), CALCULATE(ABS(SUM('Process Order Reservation'[Requirement Quantity])),FILTER('Process Order Reservation', 'Process Order Reservation'[Requirement Date]< TODAY()))
